title: The fire protection measures provided shall be well maintained by the Owner / Society / Organization as per the rules and policies prescribed by the concerned fire authority
clause_text: The fire protection measures provided shall be well maintained by the Owner / Society / Organization as per the rules and policies prescribed by the concerned fire authority.
